13  package net.sf.oval.test.validator;
14  
15  import java.util.List;
16  
17  import junit.framework.TestCase;
18  import net.sf.oval.ConstraintViolation;
19  import net.sf.oval.Validator;
20  import net.sf.oval.constraint.NotNull;
21  
22  /**
23   * @author Sebastian Thomschke
24   */
25  public class ConditionalConstraintsTest extends TestCase
26  {
27  	protected static class TestEntity
28  	{
29  		@NotNull(when = "groovy:_this.lastname!=null", message = "NOT_NULL")
30  		public String firstname;
31  
32  		public String lastname;
33  	}
34  
35  	public void testConstraintViolationOrder()
36  	{
37  		final TestEntity e = new TestEntity();
38  		final Validator v = new Validator();
39  		List<ConstraintViolation> violations = v.validate(e);
40  		assertEquals(0, violations.size());
41  		e.lastname = "foo";
42  		violations = v.validate(e);
43  		assertEquals(1, violations.size());
44  		assertEquals("NOT_NULL", violations.get(0).getMessage());
45  	}
46  }
